title.rendered: Sara and Michael Abraham Campus Center

content.rendered:
The Sara and Michael Abraham Campus Center (ACC) is the hub and heart of activity at the University of La Verne.

On any given day, you may swing by the Campus Center to attend a club meeting, play video games with friends, attend a film screening, or sink into a lounge sofa to catch up on reading.

Offices and Departments

Students and staff call Campus Center their place of business. From admission to commencement, every facet of life is, in some way, touched by the organizations below.

Admission Offices

  • Traditional Undergraduate Admission
  • Adult Learner Undergraduate Admission
  • Graduate Admission

Administrative Offices

  • Campus Center Administration
  • Commencement Services
  • Conference and Event Planning (Non-ULV groups)

Student Services

  • ASULV
  • Barbara’s Place
  • Campus Activities Board (CAB)
  • Career Center
  • Greek Life
  • Division of Student Affairs
  • Office of Student Engagement
Schedule an Event

With plenty of venues, the Campus Center is the perfect place to host an event.

Learn More
Student Employment

Campus Center accepts both Federal Work Study and Non-Federal Work Study applications.

Find Work
Promote on Digital Display

Campus Center digital displays can be used to advertise events, promote clubs, and more.

Get Started
Posting Policy

Flyers and posters are shared by Campus Center staff three days a week.

Learn More
